name: Mental Health
description: Some Planned Parenthood health centers can help you get the mental health support you need, so you can live your best life. The expert and caring staff at your nearest Planned Parenthood health center can talk with you about your mental and relationship health, and help you get the care you need. We offer services in: - Anxiety support and referrals - Depression support and referrals - Unhealthy relationship support and referrals - Substance use support and referrals
fullDescription: Some Planned Parenthood health centers can help you get the mental health support you need, so you can live your best life. whatTheyOffer: Some Planned Parenthood health centers can help you get the mental health support you need, so you can live your best life. The expert and caring staff at your nearest Planned Parenthood health center can talk with you about your mental and relationship health, and help you get the care you need. We offer services in: - Anxiety support and referrals - Depression support and referrals - Unhealthy relationship support and referrals - Substance use support and referrals
howToGetIt: Talk to Planned Parenthood staff online or in-person at your local health center to get the care you need. Make an appointment online or call 1-800-230-PLAN. Not every Planned Parenthood health center provides all services. Check with your nearest Planned Parenthood health center about the services they offer.
agency: Planned Parenthood - San Francisco Health Center
